text: I really like where Tony Robbins says that we're all hypnotized to see beauty this one specific way, and it's true.
author: Gwyneth Paltrow

text: Beauty fades! I just turned 29, so I probably don't have that many good years left in me.
author: Gwyneth Paltrow

text: Beauty, to me is about being comfortable in your own skin.
author: Gwyneth Paltrow

text: You can't possibly fathom the ins and outs of a prepubescent beauty treatment until you've felt the strange but exhilarating tingle of a cottage-cheese-and-Pop-Rocks facial.
author: Sloane Crosley

text: As Ralph's character begins to discover the political thriller aspect of the film, he falls deeper in love with his wife, so the two run together. That's the beauty of this film. It has fast pace and excitement, but it also has heart and soul.
author: Rachel Weisz
